de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store

Class IndexedDocumentsVectorReaderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.VectorReader
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.IndexedDocumentsVectorReaderBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LuceneVectorReader

    public abstract class IndexedDocumentsVectorReaderBase
extends VectorReader
    Abstract base class for vector readers using indexed documents from a traditional IR index.
    Author:
    Richard Eckart de Castilho
